brand_essence.personality: A sophisticated data platform that feels like a high-end instrument — precise, powerful, yet approachable. Think Bloomberg Terminal meets Linear's elegance.
brand_essence.visual_metaphor: Light emerging from structured darkness — data illuminating decisions

surfaces.card_opacity: cards use 95% opacity with subtle backdrop blur

usage_rules: Primary indigo (#6366F1) for interactive elements and key focal points
Cyan (#22D3EE) for data flows, connections, and secondary highlights
Never mix more than 2 accent colors in a single composition

geometry.shapes: Exclusively rounded rectangles. No circles except for status dots and avatars. No sharp corners anywhere.

rules: All floating elements have consistent soft shadow falling down-right (light from top-left)
Glows are always diffuse and soft, never harsh
Maximum 3 elevation levels visible in any composition

line_system.connection_style: Smooth bezier curves with 40% tension. Never straight angular lines between nodes.
line_system.flow_arrows: Rounded ends, no sharp arrowheads. Use gradient opacity (solid to transparent) to show direction.

glow_effects.node_glow: Soft 20px blur, accent color at 40% opacity
glow_effects.line_glow: 8px blur along path, accent color at 30% opacity
glow_effects.ui_highlight: Inner glow, 4px blur, white at 10% opacity on top edge
glow_effects.pulse_effect: Concentric rings fading outward, used on active/central nodes
rules: Every focal element has exactly one glow source
Glows always use accent colors, never white
Glow intensity decreases with distance from focal point

typography_visual.headings: Bold weight (700), tight letter-spacing (-0.02em), large size contrast
typography_visual.body: Regular weight (400), comfortable letter-spacing (0), generous line-height (1.6)
typography_visual.labels: Medium weight (500), slightly condensed, uppercase for categories
typography_visual.numbers: Tabular figures, medium weight, often larger than surrounding text
typography_visual.style: Sans-serif only. Geometric grotesque feel (like Inter, SF Pro, or Geist).
typography_visual.in_images: Minimal text. When present: short labels only, never sentences. Use hierarchy through size, not font variation.

iconography.style: Outlined icons, 1.5px stroke weight, rounded caps and joins
iconography.size: Consistent 24px base size, scales to 32px for emphasis, 20px for dense UI
iconography.fill: Never filled. Outline only with accent color or white.

composition.focal_point: Every image has ONE clear focal point, slightly above and left of center
composition.balance: Asymmetric balance. Primary element 60% of composition, supporting elements 40%.
composition.negative_space: Generous margins. At least 15% padding from edges.
composition.layering: Maximum 3 distinct layers: background, midground (supporting), foreground (focal)
composition.perspective: Slight isometric tilt (10-15 degrees) for UI mockups. Flat for diagrams.
composition.floating_elements: Secondary elements float around main focal point, never overlapping it

animation_hints.implied_motion: Use gradient trails and blur direction to suggest gentle, slow movement
animation_hints.data_flow: Lines with gradient opacity (solid at source, fading at destination)
animation_hints.pulse_nodes: Concentric glow rings suggest active/processing state
animation_hints.parallax_depth: Background elements slightly blurred, foreground sharp

consistency_rules: ALL images share the same gradient background direction (135deg)
ALL cards use the same corner radius (16px large radius)
ALL glows use the same diffusion (20px blur for nodes, 8px for lines)
ALL connection lines use the same bezier curve tension
ALL shadows fall in the same direction (down-right, light from top-left)
ALL UI elements use the exact same spacing unit (8px base grid)
Color temperature is always cool (no warm oranges/reds except for warnings)
Maximum saturation for accents is 80%, never fully saturated
avoid: Brand logos or recognizable company symbols
Pure black (#000000) — always use deep blue-black (#050816)
Pure white backgrounds — always tinted slightly blue
Gradients that shift hue (blue-to-green) — only shift lightness
More than 3 accent colors per image
